title: Analytics and reports
text_1: Analyze occupancy, space usage and costs associated to it. Gain insights on your workforce at a group and individual level to ensure compliance with remote work laws.
text_2: With DeWocracy you can historically audit your workforce office attendance and remote work prevalence.
text_3: Additionally, with the Pro Office plan you will have access to custom reports with the data you care about in .xls or .csv format.
